description:
This 3-pack bundles a few pairs of Stance’s Run Ultra Light Tab socks together, saving you enough money to buy a couple of your favourite gels. These low-profile, minimalist socks are built for high performance.

  • FreshTek™ moisture control with performance mesh keeps you cool with maximum airflow and breathability
  • Infiknit™ construction add durability to high-friction areas
  • Seamless toe closure and engineered ankle protection for hotspot- and chafe-free wear
  • Reflective logo for enhanced visibility during low-light workouts
name: Stance Run Ultra Light Tab Socks 3-Pack - Unisex
